SEARCH
Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package controllers

Class ChicagoPizzaController

java.lang.Object
controllers.ChicagoPizzaController
public class ChicagoPizzaController extends Object
Controller class for the Chicago-style pizza view. Handles user interactions for creating and customizing Chicago pizzas.
Since:
2024-11-17
Author:
Pranav Chundi

  • Constructor Details

    • ChicagoPizzaController

      public ChicagoPizzaController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the controller with default settings and binds UI components. Sets up pizza type and size selection listeners.

    • updatePizzaWithNewSize

      private void updatePizzaWithNewSize()
      Updates the current pizza object with the new size selected by the user. Retains toppings if it's a "Build Your Own" pizza.

    • getSelectedSize

      private Size getSelectedSize()
      Determines the size selected in the UI and returns it. Defaults to SMALL if no size is selected.
      Returns:
      The selected pizza size.

    • handlePizzaTypeSelection

      private void handlePizzaTypeSelection()
      Handles pizza type selection and creates the corresponding pizza object. Clears or populates toppings based on the pizza type.

    • setImage

      private void setImage(String imageName)
      Sets the pizza image in the UI based on the selected pizza type. If the image is missing, handles gracefully without crashing.
      Parameters:
      imageName - The filename of the image to display.

    • populateAvailableToppings

      private void populateAvailableToppings()
      Populates the available toppings list for "Build Your Own" pizzas.

    • populateSelectedToppingsOnly

      private void populateSelectedToppingsOnly()
      Populates the selected toppings list for pre-defined pizza types.

    • clearToppingsLists

      private void clearToppingsLists()
      Clears both the available and selected toppings lists in the UI.

    • addTopping

      private void addTopping()
      Adds a selected topping from the available list to the current pizza. Displays an alert if the maximum number of toppings (7) is exceeded.

    • removeTopping

      private void removeTopping()
      Removes a selected topping from the current pizza and moves it back to the available list.

    • addToOrder

      private void addToOrder()
      Adds the current pizza to the order and resets the form for a new selection. Displays a success message upon completion.

    • resetForm

      private void resetForm()
      Resets the UI form to its default state, clearing all selections and inputs.

    • updateDisplay

      private void updateDisplay()
      Updates the display fields for the current pizza, including crust and price.

    • updatePrice

      private void updatePrice()
      Updates the pizza price field dynamically based on the current pizza configuration.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an informational alert to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to show in the alert dialog.
